meanings.definition: The quality or state of being much.
meanings.sent1: Her muchnesses in creativity always inspired others.
meanings.sent2: The muchnesses of her kindness knew no bounds.
meanings.sent3: His muchnesses in enthusiasm made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The muchnesses of her love enveloped everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The muchnesses of his generosity shone brightly in the community.

meanings.sent1: The muchnesses of books in the library amazed her.
meanings.sent2: He was surprised by the muchnesses of food at the buffet.
meanings.sent3: The muchnesses of toys in the store made the children excited.
meanings.sent4: The muchnesses of stars in the sky took her breath away.
meanings.sent5: The muchnesses of flowers in the garden painted a beautiful scene.
